translation.en: ♪ I never used to take it slow ♪ ♪ Now I feel the air And take the long way home ♪
Okay, let's get you a little bit more... about there. You look great.
translation.es: Bien, muévete un poco más ahí.

translation.en: Okay, folks. Let's hold it right there.
translation.es: Lucen bien. Bueno, amigos, quédense ahí.

translation.en: -I gotta take this. -[phone buzzing] No, you promised.

translation.es: - Es del trabajo.- Sí, es tradición.

translation.en: Well, we have to send out the Christmas cards the first week of December,
translation.es: Debemos enviar las tarjetas de Navidadla primera semana de diciembre

translation.en: and we only have Luke for another day before he goes to college.
translation.es: y Luke se va a la universidad mañana.

translation.en: You guys could just Photoshop me in.
-[phone clicks] -Yeah. I am in the car. Can you just hold a sec?
translation.es: Sí. Estoy en el auto.¿Puedes esperar un segundo?

translation.en: -Terry. -And Lola's in law school, and Jake just got married.
translation.es: Y Lola estudia derecho,y Jake acaba de casarse.

translation.en: Yeah, Lola a lawyer, and Jake just married?
translation.es: ¿Lola es abogaday Jake acaba de casarse?

translation.en: Hey, have a good day, guys.
[woman] So that's it, huh? Tomorrow you've got an empty nest.
translation.es: ¿Eso es todo?Mañana tendrás un nido vacío.

translation.en: [Kate] Yes. And I was thinking, you know, with Luke out of the house,
translation.es: Sí, estaba pensandoque como Luke no estará en la casa,

translation.en: maybe I should go back to work.
[Tabitha] Well, you always did love being a vet.
Who says you've gotta re-enter the workforce anyway?
translation.es: ¿Quién dice que debes volver a trabajar?

translation.en: Well, I do! I mean, what else am I gonna do?
-[glasses clink] -You guys, don't ever call us that again.
translation.es: Chicas, no vuelvan a llamarnos así.

translation.en: [Luke] Trunk's almost full. This is the last load.
translation.es: El baúl está casi lleno.Esta es la última carga.
Sí. También llevo pasta de dientes, mamá.

translation.en: Thanks so much for letting me drive him.
[Kate] Aw. I'm sure you have a lot to talk about.
translation.es: Seguro tienen mucho de qué hablar.

translation.en: And you be careful on the road, okay? We will.
-[Drew] You good to go, kiddo? -Yup! We're outta here!
[Luke] This is the last time, though.
Oh, come on! Surely it's not the last time!
Remember what you used to tell me, that I could be
translation.es: ¿Recuerdas que me decías que podía ser

translation.en: an astronaut, or the president of the United States?
translation.es: astronautao presidente de los Estados Unidos?

translation.en: Well, how's that supposed to happen if I stay here?
translation.es: ¿Cómo va a pasar eso si me quedo aquí?

translation.en: It's just something that parents tell their children.
translation.es: Es algo que los padres les dicena sus hijos.

translation.en: Let him get on the road before it gets dark.
translation.es: Que salga antes de que oscurezca.

translation.en: Get good grades, and next summer you'll intern at the firm.
translation.es: Obtén buenas calificacionesy serás pasante en el bufete.

translation.en: Okay, so we are gonna FaceTime everyday, right?
translation.es: Bien, nos llamaremos por FaceTimetodos los días, ¿no?

translation.en: -Once a week. I love you guys. -[Kate sighs]
translation.es: Una vez por semana. Los amo.

translation.en: I'll eat, I'll breathe, I'll even wear a sweater.
translation.es: Comeré, respiraré  e incluso usaré un suéter.

translation.en: I know you'll be okay, I just-- I love you so much.
translation.es: Sé que estarás bien. Te amo mucho.

translation.en: and I know we haven't been spending a lot of time alone, and I know things aren't great,
translation.es: y sé que no pasamos mucho tiempo a solasy que las cosas no son perfectas,

translation.en: so I booked us to go on our second honeymoon.
translation.es: reservé una segunda luna de miel.

translation.en: Look, I-- I waited until Luke was gone because I didn't want to upset him...
translation.es: Esperé a que Luke se fueraporque no quería entristecerlo.

translation.en: Why? [stammering] What's wrong? Are you sick?
-Well, no one's happy all the time. -Kate...
translation.es: Nadie es feliz todo el tiempo. Kate, ya no estoy enamorado de ti.

translation.en: I'm not in love with you anymore.
translation.es: Kate, ya no estoy enamorado de ti.

translation.en: And I'm pretty sure you feel the same.
translation.es: Estoy seguro de que sientes lo mismo.

translation.en: I'll be at the Carlyle if you need to reach me.
translation.es: Estaré en el Carlylesi necesitas contactarme.

translation.en: I don't understand, I don't understand.
Are you involved with someone else?
So, you're just leaving me like this with-- with no discussion?
translation.es: Entonces,¿me dejas así sin siquiera hablarlo?

translation.en: We had a lot of good years.
I think in the long run, you'll see this is better for both of us.
translation.es: Creo que a la larga,verás que es mejor para los dos.
SR. Y SRA. CONRAD GUÍA DE ÁFRICA Y SUS IDIOMAS

translation.en: It's part of the meal plan.
translation.es: Es parte del plan de comidas.

translation.en: Could I have another one of these, please?
-♪ Making me feel all right ♪ -[man] Hey, gorgeous.
-I hope you bring cash this time. -My IOU's aren't good enough anymore?
translation.es: - Espero que tengas dinero.- ¿Mis pagarés ya no sirven?

translation.en: Why are you asking questions you're afraid of the answer to?
I knew it. What does that mean?
Oh, it's Mr. and Mrs. Conrad.
translation.es: Son el señor y la señora Conrad.

translation.en: [Derek] I take it Mr. Conrad won't be joining us?
translation.es: Supongo que el señor Conrad no vendrá.
- Desfase horario.- No. - ¿Llamada de negocios?- No.

translation.en: What, did he fall down a well?
Do you actually want to know where Mr. Conrad is?
translation.es: ¿De verdad quieres saberdónde está el señor Conrad?

translation.en: he told me that our marriage was over.
Two hours ago, I landed here
on what was supposed to be our second honeymoon, by myself.
translation.es: en lo que se suponíaque sería nuestra segunda luna de miel.

translation.en: In two weeks, I will be in a lawyer's office,
translation.es: En dos semanas, estaréen la oficina de un abogado,

translation.en: trying to get back the decades I spent
translation.es: tratando de recuperar las décadas que pasé

translation.en: putting him through grad school, raising our son,
translation.es: pagándole el posgrado,criando a nuestro hijo,

translation.en: entertaining his clients, and somehow becoming one of the ladies who lunch.
translation.es: agasajando a sus clientes, y, no se cómo, convirtiéndomeen una de las damas que almuerzan.

translation.en: Is there anything else that you would like to know?
translation.es: ¿Hay algo más que te gustaría saber?

translation.en: I was just wondering if you were gonna eat all that food
translation.es: Me preguntaba si ibas a comer todo eso.

translation.en: -Thank you! -♪ Feel it in the air ♪
You have lost your touch, my friend!
But I thought it was supposed to be a... Luxury couples safari.
translation.es: - Pero creí que sería...- Un safari de lujo para parejas.
- Tú eres el piloto.- Por hoy.

translation.en: Because we do boldly go where no tourist has gone before.
translation.es: Porque iremosadonde ningún turista ha ido antes.

translation.en: Two L's, in case you want to write my name down on a complaint form.
translation.es: Con doble ele,por si deseas presentar una queja.

translation.en: So I thought it was good luck to name your plane after a woman.
translation.es: Creí que era buena suerte llamaral avión como una mujer.

translation.en: -Actually it's a woman you love. -[belt rattles]
translation.es: De hecho, es como a una mujer que amas.

translation.en: Truth is, this one was already named "Kira" when I got her, so I only had to paint over one letter.
translation.es: Se llamaba Kira cuando lo compré.Solo tuve que cambiar una letra.

translation.en: It's about a 40-minute flight. -[gear cranks] -to the lodge.
translation.es: El vuelo hasta la posada seráde 40 minutos.

translation.en: Don't let the name "lodge" fool you.
translation.es: No dejesque la palabra "posada" te engañe.

translation.en: You'll be surrounded by five-star luxury.
Cessna Mike India Alpha, East tie-down, departing runway 35, Lusaka.
translation.es: Cessna Mike India Alfa, anclaje al este,salida de la pista 35, Lusaka.

translation.en: We're flying over the oldest and largest game Reserve in Africa,
translation.es: Sobrevolamos la reserva de cazamás antigua y grande de África,

translation.en: Lion, leopard, rhino, cape buffalo, elephant.
translation.es: León, leopardo, rinoceronte,búfalo cafre y elefante.

translation.en: [Derek] Some people say it's the most dangerous animal out here.
translation.es: Algunos dicenque es el animal más peligroso.

translation.en: I need you to stay in the plane.
Stay here? [stammers] What if you don't come back?
translation.es: ¿Quedarme en el avión? ¿Y si no vuelves?

translation.en: -It's Derek. You read me? -[man on walkie] Yes.
We have an orphan five kilometers southwest of N'goma.
translation.es: Hay un huérfano a cinco kilómetrosal suroeste de N'goma.

translation.en: You'll find us just north of where I landed the airplane. We'll need a truck.
translation.es: Estamos al norte de donde aterricé.Necesitaremos un camión.
Mataron a la mamá por los colmillos.

translation.en: If we don't do something to help that baby, he'll be dead in two days.
translation.es: Si no ayudamos a la cría,morirá en dos días.

translation.en: I need you to talk to him,
stay right in front of him, keep his attention.
translation.es: te quedes frente a ély atraigas su atención.
No tengas miedo. Todo está bien.

translation.en: We gotta get him on his side, so he doesn't charge us. I got this.
translation.es: Debemos recostarlopara que no nos ataque. Yo lo haré.

translation.en: Okay. I'll keep him calm, get some water out of my backpack.
translation.es: Bien. Lo mantendré tranquilo.Trae agua de mi mochila.

translation.en: He needs to know that we're here to help him.
translation.es: Necesita saber que vamos a ayudarlo.

translation.en: Nobody in the world needs ivory, except an elephant.
translation.es: Nadie en el mundo necesita marfil,excepto un elefante.

translation.en: What's going to happen to him?
We'll take him back to the shelter and nurse him back to health.
translation.es: Lo llevaremos al refugioy lo cuidaremos.

translation.en: We didn't have great luck with the last one, but he looks like he's in a little better shape.
translation.es: No tuvimos suerte con el último,pero parece que él está mejor.

translation.en: Let's get you to the lodge.
[Derek] You'll be sipping martinis before sunset.
Listen, I know this is very emotional,
translation.es: Escucha, sé que esto es muy emotivo,

translation.en: but there's nothing you can do.
[stammers] I haven't practiced in a while, and I mostly worked on dogs and cats,
translation.es: Hace mucho no trabajoy casi siempre atendí perros y gatos,

translation.en: but I really want to help.
What do you know about elephants?
[Kate] It's gonna be okay. It's gonna be all right, little baby.
translation.es: Estarás bien. Todo estará bien, bebito.

translation.en: He's in shock. The grief of losing his family.
translation.es: Está conmocionado.El dolor de perder a su familia.

translation.en: What can I do to help?
We have to make sure that he's hydrated and stays warm.
translation.es: Tenemos que asegurarnosde que esté hidratado y caliente.

translation.en: [Jonathan] We'll get this into his ear right here.
translation.es: Le pondremos esto en la oreja.

translation.en: If he doesn't get up in a day's time,
translation.es: Si no se levanta en un día,

translation.en: We try and replicate life in the herd.
translation.es: Tratamos de replicar la vida en manada.

translation.en: Each baby has a keeper, making sure they are never alone.
translation.es: Cada bebé tiene un guardiánque ve que nunca estén solos.

translation.en: We also trade off, so the calves don't get too attached to one person,
translation.es: También nos turnamos, así las críasno se apegan a una sola persona

translation.en: When the elephants are ready to leave the nursery, they spend their nights there,
translation.es: Cuando están listos para salir de aquí,pasan la noche allí,

translation.en: and at their own pace, which sometimes does take years,
translation.es: y a su propio ritmo,que a veces lleva años,

translation.en: they gradually make the transition back into the wild.
translation.es: gradualmente hacen la transicióna la naturaleza.

translation.en: And these are our living quarters,
but most of us prefer to sleep with the elephants.
translation.es: pero la mayoría prefiere dormircon los elefantes.

translation.en: How do the older elephants react to the babies you rescue?
translation.es: ¿Cómo reaccionan los elefantes mayoresa los bebés que rescatan?

translation.en: Right now we have three babies, four teenagers and three adults.
translation.es: Ahora tenemos tres bebés,cuatro adolescentes y tres adultos.

translation.en: She's practicing to be a matriarch.

translation.es: Es muy curiosa y muy mandona.

translation.en: [laughs] Well, Chuma, you have some New York in you!
translation.es: Chuma, tienes algo de Nueva York.

translation.en: [Jonathan] Elephants have all the emotions of humans.
translation.es: Los elefantes tienen las emocionesde los humanos,

translation.en: A sense of humor and a sense of family.
translation.es: sentido del humor y sentido de familia.

translation.en: -The children want attention, -[elephant vocalizing] and the teenagers rebel.
translation.es: Los niños quieren atencióny los adolescentes se rebelan.

translation.en: Come. It's almost suppertime for the little ones.
translation.es: Ven. Es casi la hora de la cenade los más pequeños.

translation.en: We feed the babies separately from the adults.
translation.es: Alimentamos a los bebésy a los adultos por separado.

translation.en: That's Kasewe. We rescued him last week.
translation.es: Él es Kasewe.Lo rescatamos la semana pasada.

translation.en: Why don't you get some rest?
The first tent on the end is yours, and we take supper in the boma.
translation.es: La primera tienda de la punta es tuyay cenamos en la boma.

translation.en: Jonathan said the tent on the end.
translation.es: Jonathan dijo "la tienda de la punta".

translation.en: you live here, like, all the time?
translation.es: que vives aquí todo el tiempo?

translation.en: Yeah, I fly the tourists to help us pay for the plane.
translation.es: Sí, llevo a los turistaspara poder pagar el avión.

translation.en: Oh, I put your suitcase in your tent.
translation.es: Puse tu maleta en tu tienda.

translation.en: Forgive the mess. I'm not very good at folding.
translation.es: Perdona el desorden.No soy bueno para doblar.

translation.en: Kinda opened up when I threw it on the bed.
translation.es: Se abrió cuando la tiré en la cama.

translation.en: -So you just went through my stuff? -No.
But I don't think you're gonna need those high heels here.
translation.es: Pero no creoque necesites esos tacones altos.

translation.en: I don't want any more visitors.
[South African woman] No, no, no, no.
Tell him that Leslie Van Der Mere-Jones called, exclamation point!
translation.es: ¡Dile que Leslie Van Der Mere-Jones llamó,con signos de exclamación!

translation.en: -[Kate] These are beautiful! -[Derek] Come on, grab a plate.
translation.es: - Son hermosas.- Vamos, toma un plato.

translation.en: And if you stay long enough, the day after that, the day after that, and the day after that.
translation.es: Y si te quedas más tiempo,al día siguiente y al siguiente.

translation.en: I don't know. I didn't really mean to, but...
translation.es: No lo sé. No quise hacerlo, pero...

translation.en: [stammers] I guess-- I guess life just happened.
So you supported your husband through school,
translation.es: Así que apoyaste a tu esposoen su posgrado,

translation.en: helped him build his business, raised the kid, and then
translation.es: lo ayudaste a construir su negocio,criaste a tu hijo y luego

translation.en: Did I tell you all that?
And a lot about the ladies who lunch.
translation.es: Y mucho sobre las damas que almuerzan.

translation.en: So you never get any of those type of surprises.
translation.es: Así que nunca tienes esas sorpresas.

translation.en: You don't wake up one day and someone doesn't love you anymore.
translation.es: No te despiertas un díay alguien ya no te quiere.

translation.en: I thought Africa was known for its good coffee.
translation.es: Pensé que África era conocidapor su buen café.

translation.en: [Derek] Your first time under the southern sky?
translation.es: ¿Es tu primera vez bajo el cielo del sur?

translation.en: We have a telescope at home
because Luke really loved it until he fell in love with music.
translation.es: porque a Luke le encantabahasta que se enamoró de la música.

translation.en: What keeps them from coming into camp?
Good night, New York. Good night.
translation.es: - Buenas noches, Nueva York.- Buenas noches.

translation.en: Yup, tonight's my shift with the orphans.
translation.es: Sí, esta noche es mi turnocon los huérfanos.

translation.en: Next time, don't walk alone out there. It's not safe.
translation.es: La próxima vez, no camines sola.No es seguro.

translation.en: I mean, it's safe, but not so safe.
translation.es: Bueno, es seguro, pero no tan seguro.

translation.en: You have made me the happiest woman in the world!
translation.es: ¡Me has hechola mujer más feliz del mundo!

translation.en: Thank you! I hear that a lot.
I think we're gonna need more milk.
[man over walkie] Derek, you got a pick-up from the lodge. Private tour.
translation.es: Hola, Derek. Debes ir a la posada.Es una visita privada.

translation.en: Take good care of my elephant.
Nice to see you on your feet, young man!
It appears that you have brought us good luck.
translation.es: Parece que nos trajiste buena suerte.

translation.en: I did nothing. I did nothing.
I think this little calf would disagree.
translation.es: Creo que esta cría no estaría de acuerdo.

translation.en: This is the biggest baby I've ever fed, definitely bigger than the last one.
translation.es: Es el bebé más grande que he alimentado,mucho más grande que el anterior.

translation.en: I do. I have a son.
Then we shall call this one Manu.
[Kate] Oh, Manu, I hope you like your new name!
translation.es: Manu, espero que te guste tu nuevo nombre.

translation.en: How long have you lived with them?
I grew up on the reserve.
He moved here when he was 16.
Our fathers were game wardens together.
translation.es: Nuestros padres eranguardas de la reserva.

translation.en: I wish I could stay longer.
Oh, you know what? No one really calls me that.
Did you not earn the title?
The local vet comes around once a month, if we're lucky.
translation.es: El veterinario local viene una vez al messi tenemos suerte.
Así que eres la doctora Kate.

translation.en: You're hungry for your milk. I'll go get it.
translation.es: Quieres beber leche. Iré por ella.

translation.en: -Good morning, Jonathan! -Good morning, Dr. Kate. Shift change.
translation.es: - ¡Buenos días, Jonathan!- Buenos días, Dra. Kate. Cambio de turno.

translation.en: You know, I could stay a little longer.
Better not. We don't want him missing you.
translation.es: Mejor no. No queremos que te extrañe.

translation.en: Your return ticket is for September 28th, right?
translation.es: Tu boleto de regreso espara el 28 de septiembre, ¿cierto?

translation.en: Time flies when you're out here.
Lookin' at your fancy African vacay pics?
This Christmas. It was supposed to be our Christmas card.
translation.es: Esta Navidad.Esa iba a ser nuestra tarjeta de Navidad.

translation.en: Hence the staged glamour of it all.
and you didn't get to go on your fancy five-star safari,
translation.es: y no fuiste a tu sofisticado safaride cinco estrellas,

translation.en: let me take you on one.
But with the value of five.
-Sometimes I come out here to paint. -Mm-hm.
translation.es: A veces vengo aquí a pintar.

translation.en: -will start mingling with the wild herd. -Mm.
translation.es: empezarán a mezclarsecon la manada salvaje.

translation.en: And then they might start staying out for one or two nights at a time.
translation.es: Y luego podrían quedarse fuerauna o dos noches.

translation.en: Chuma over there has been wandering off.
One night she's just gonna decide she's not coming home,
translation.es: Una noche va a decidirque no volverá a casa

translation.en: and from that time on, she'll be a wild elephant again.
translation.es: y a partir de ese momento,volverá a ser una elefante salvaje.

translation.en: -Don't you get sad when they leave? -I used to.
translation.es: - ¿No te entristeces cuando se van?- Antes sí.

translation.en: But they're meant to live in the wild.
translation.es: Pero deben vivir en la naturaleza.

translation.en: It's the empty nest syndrome. I guess it's everywhere.
translation.es: Es el síndrome del nido vacío.Supongo que está en todas partes.

translation.en: [sighs] My son just left for college.
translation.es: Mi hijo se fue a la universidad.

translation.en: In a dorm room one state over,
translation.es: Está en un dormitorio,a un estado de distancia,

translation.en: Just because we don't see them doesn't mean that they're not still a part of us.
translation.es: Que no los veamos no significaque aún no sean parte de nosotros.

translation.en: But it wasn't in the cards.
translation.es: Pero no estaba en mi destino.

translation.en: How long have you been divorced?
[stammers] I'm so sorry. No, it's okay.
translation.es: - Lo siento mucho.- No, está bien.

translation.en: She had a gallery in town.
translation.es: Ella tenía una galería en la ciudad.

translation.en: And then she got ill, and when she passed...
translation.es: Y luego se enfermó, y cuando falleció...

translation.en: When you first get married, you think, "Well, that's it.
translation.es: Cuando te casas, piensas:"Bueno, eso es todo.

translation.en: Everything is just gonna be fine now."
translation.es: Ahora todo va a estar bien".

translation.en: Now I've gotta go back home, and I don't know what I'm supposed to do with myself.
translation.es: Ahora debo regresar a casay no sé qué debo hacer de mi vida.

translation.en: Taking a second honeymoon with myself?
translation.es: ¿Tomarme una segunda luna de mielconmigo misma?

translation.en: I'm good. How are you? How's school?
translation.es: Estoy bien.¿Cómo estás tú? ¿Y la universidad?

translation.en: Well, I took a little detour,
and now I'm in this place surrounded by wild animals.
translation.es: y estoy en este lugar rodeadode animales salvajes.

translation.en: -[student] Hey, go long! Go long! -[laughing through screen]
chapati with tomato and goat cheese,
translation.es: chapati con tomate y queso de cabra,

translation.en: a.k.a. New York thin crust pizza.
translation.es: como la pizza crocante de Nueva York.

translation.en: Now this makes me wanna be a lady who lunches.
translation.es: Esto me hace querer seruna dama que almuerza.

translation.en: And I just wanna say to all of you,
because these last few weeks have meant more to me than you can ever know.
translation.es: porque las últimas semanas han significadomucho más de lo que se imaginan.
Y las mujeres, como los elefantes,

translation.en: So even though I'm gonna be far away,
I want you to know that I'm never gonna forget any of you.
translation.es: ...quiero que sepan que nunca olvidaréa ninguno de ustedes.

translation.en: [Derek] You really have a telescope on the 15th floor?
The flickering lights of about a million TVs. [chuckles]
translation.es: Las luces parpadeantesde un millón de televisores.

translation.en: Come on. I wanna show you something.
Oh, I've already seen your tent.
I think you were looking at more than the tent.
you can look through your telescope at all the fabulous televisions,
translation.es: ves con tu telescopiotodos los fabulosos televisores,

translation.en: This is Leslie Van Der Mere-Jones. She's with the foundation
translation.es: Ella es Leslie Van Der Mere-Jones. Está con la fundaciónque nos mantiene a flote.
Está con la fundaciónque nos mantiene a flote.
- Es la...- Turista que sigue aquí.

translation.en: Well, it's late so I'm just going to head back to my tent.
translation.es: Bueno, es tarde,así que regresaré a mi tienda.

translation.en: I never met someone with five last names.
translation.es: Nunca conocí a alguiencon cinco apellidos.

translation.en: Now hang on! No, it's fine.
It's on me. I just should've stuck with my first impression.
translation.es: Es mi culpa. Debería haberme quedadocon mi primera impresión.

translation.en: You're lonely but you don't know it,
translation.es: Te sientes solo, pero no lo sabes,

translation.en: so you just use all your thing
to get what you need in the moment and you don't think about anybody else.
translation.es: para conseguir lo que necesitasen el momento y no piensas en nadie más.

translation.en: [Jonathan] Well, someone doesn't want you to leave.
translation.es: Alguien no quiere que te vayas.

translation.en: How long does it take her to pack?
-[Jonathan] She's not going. -What do you mean?
Don't flatter yourself. It's not you. He has a gray trunk, weighs 600 pounds
translation.es: No te hagas ilusiones. No eres tú.Tiene una trompa gris, pesa 270 kg

translation.en: and he has a drinking problem.
translation.es: y tiene problemas con la bebida.

translation.en: Yeah, I guess I never saw that coming.
translation.es: Supongo que no me lo esperaba.

translation.en: Dear Luke, I know I've exceeded my weekly FaceTime allotment,
translation.es: Querido Luke, sé que excedími asignación semanal de FaceTime,

translation.en: so I'm writing this email to tell you that
translation.es: así que escribo este correo para decirte

translation.en: I have decided to stay out here a little longer.
translation.es: que he decidido quedarme aquí un poco más.

translation.en: -[upbeat Christmas song playing] -♪ Santa's coming to town, town ♪ ♪ And he's bringing joy For all the kids around, 'round ♪
♪ What took you so long? I needed you ♪
How are you today? Are you ready for your check-up?
translation.es: ¿Cómo estás hoy?¿Estás listo para tu revisión?

translation.en: -[birds chirping] -[Jonathan] Come on. It's Christmas week!
translation.es: Vamos. Es la semana de Navidad.

translation.en: Our families are almost here. Cheer up!
Is your family here yet? No, not yet.
But you will hear them. They are very loud. [chuckles]
translation.es: Pero los oirás. Son muy ruidosos.

translation.en: [chuckles] I can't wait to meet them.
One day maybe we can meet your family, too.
translation.es: Quizá un día podamos conocer a tu familia.

translation.en: Oh, that would be nice, but my son is gonna stay at college this year with his friends.
translation.es: Sería lindo, pero mi hijo se quedaráen la universidad con sus amigos.

translation.en: Dr. Kate, I realize that you're away from your family this Christmas,
translation.es: Doctora Kate, sé que estás lejosde tu familia esta Navidad,

translation.en: but I want you to know that you're a part of ours now.
translation.es: pero quiero que sepasque ahora eres parte de la nuestra.

translation.en: Go say hi to Uncle Derek. [together] Uncle Derek!
You guys have gotten so big.
Hey, I wrestle elephants for a living. You're just a little rabbit to me.
translation.es: Mi trabajo es luchar con elefantes.Eres un conejo para mí.

translation.en: Hi! Jonathan has written much about you.
translation.es: ¡Hola! Jonathan ha escrito mucho sobre ti.

translation.en: So nice to finally meet you.
I'm Lulu, and this is my sister, Nia.
translation.es: Soy Lulu, y ella es mi hermana, Nia.

translation.en: Oh, you guys are adorable! Let's get some treats! Let's go!
-[Aliyah] Hi, Derek! -Good to see you! How are you?
[Nia] Now you can look at this.
Ooh, I see this is a tent.
-[Kate] Who are these? -Oh, this one is you.
-[Kate] Oh! -And this one is Uncle Derek.
translation.es: Y este es el tío Derek.

translation.en: Well, I like it, but there's just one problem.
translation.es: Bueno, me gusta,pero solo hay un problema.

translation.en: Is that handsome fellow supposed to be me?
And why is he missing a hand?
translation.es: ¿Y por qué le falta una mano?
Una entrega de Navidad para ti.

translation.en: Well, it isn't actually for me.
-Well, you know, maybe just a little bit. -[paper tears]
I see you've done this before.
[chuckles] Only about twice a day for the last 20 years.
translation.es: Solo dos veces al díadurante los últimos 20 años.
De Alguien y Alguien y Asociados.

translation.en: Oh, and did you read it, too?

translation.es: No, el sobre era muy grueso.

translation.en: -Hm. Does not look like a Christmas card. -[paper rustling]
translation.es: No parece una tarjeta de Navidad.

translation.en: Mr. Conrad is filing for divorce.
I'm gonna go see my elephant.
translation.es: Iré a ver a mi elefante.

translation.en: He seems to be doing fine.
You know, I always wanted more animals,
but Drew didn't want pet hair on his clothes.
translation.es: pero Drew no quería pelos de mascotasen su ropa.

translation.en: I mean, I just should've seen this coming. I...
Without change, there would be no butterflies.
I gotta go check on those cookies.
Chuma must've opened the gate somehow, Manu followed.
translation.es: Chuma debe haber abierto la puertade algún modo y Manu la siguió.

translation.en: -I'll fly out first light to look for him. -First light is too late.
translation.es: Despegaré cuando amanezca. Ya será tarde. Debemos ir ahora.
Ya será tarde. Debemos ir ahora.

translation.en: -They'll take care of each other. -You don't know that.
translation.es: - Se cuidarán entre sí.- No lo sabes.

translation.en: Sometimes you gotta let them wander.
translation.es: A veces tienes que dejarlos vagar.

translation.en: But he's still just a baby. Anything could happen.
translation.es: Pero sigue siendo un bebé.Podría pasar cualquier cosa.

translation.en: Wait, what are you doing? Why are we stopping?
We've been at this for a while. Need to get some sleep.
translation.es: Ya llevamos un rato haciendo esto. Necesito dormir.

translation.en: It's as good a place as any.
But shouldn't we keep looking for them?
I lost Luke one time in a shopping mall. Christmas time.
translation.es: Una vez perdí a Lukeen un centro comercial. Era Navidad.

translation.en: Yeah, but there weren't any poachers in that mall.
translation.es: Sí, pero no había cazadores furtivosen ese centro comercial.

translation.en: Looks like you put on some pounds.
-Was smaller than Manu when I found him. -[door closes]
translation.es: Era más pequeño que Manucuando lo encontré.

translation.en: We didn't think he'd make it.
How long have you known him?
What's it been, Roi? Nine, almost ten years?
translation.es: ¿Hace cuánto tiempo, Roi?¿Nueve, casi diez años?

translation.en: I remember once Jonathan's father walked into the park,
translation.es: Recuerdo que cuando el padrede Jonathan entró al parque,

translation.en: an elephant came out of the bush to greet him.
translation.es: un elefante salió de la selvapara recibirlo.

translation.en: It'd been 37 years since they'd seen each other.
translation.es: Hacía 37 años que no se veían.

translation.en: It was so nice to meet you!
[man over walkie] Hey, Derek, good news.
The rangers spotted our elephants. They're at that pond south of Kadma.
translation.es: Los guardas vieron los elefantes.Están en el estanque al sur de Kadma.

translation.en: Now this is a merry Christmas Eve!
translation.es: ¡Ahora sí es una feliz víspera de Navidad!

translation.en: [man over walkie] Hey, Derek. Got a last-minute pick-up for ya. -Come on back. -[static]
translation.es: Derek, tienes unos turistasde último momento. Vuelve.

translation.en: Well, it's not Christmas in Africa without goat stew.
translation.es: No es Navidad en Áfricasin estofado de cabra.

translation.en: a man cannot resist a good goat stew.
translation.es: que un hombre no puede resistirsea un buen estofado de cabra.

translation.en: I hear your friend Derek loves a good goat stew.
translation.es: Y sé que tu amigo Derek adoraun buen estofado de cabra.

translation.en: -He and I, we're-- we're just friends. -Hm.
-Derek needs you at the air strip. -Why? Is he okay?
translation.es: - Derek te necesita en la pista.- ¿Qué pasó?

translation.en: I picked you up a little holiday cheer for Christmas Eve.
translation.es: Te traje un poco de alegría navideñapara Nochebuena.

translation.en: Figured I'd check on you, make sure you're wearing a sweater.
translation.es: Pensé en venir a vertey ver que usaras un suéter.

translation.en: Pleasure to meet Dr. Kate's first son.
translation.es: Tú eres el primer hijo de la Dra. Kate.
Y yo soy su único hijo.

translation.en: What are you even doing here?
-He did? -Mm-hm. What about that music festival?
Yeah, we had to drop out. My finals schedule screwed everything up.
translation.es: Sí, tuvimos que abandonarlo.Mis exámenes arruinaron todo.

translation.en: All right, I'm gonna take this stuff back to the tent,
translation.es: Bien, llevaré estas cosas a la tiendapara que puedan ponerse al día.

translation.en: so you guys can catch up. Next time you fly, one hand on the yoke.
translation.es: Bien, llevaré estas cosas a la tiendapara que puedan ponerse al día. La próxima, una mano en el yugo.

translation.en: He let me push a few levers. Seems like a nice guy.
translation.es: Me dejó tocar unas palancas.Parece un buen tipo.

translation.en: I wanted to name this one Sadie.
-♪ The silent stars go by ♪ -[Derek] Yeah!
You know, I haven't seen you do that in a long time.
translation.es: No te había visto hacer esoen mucho tiempo.

translation.en: If I've learned anything here, it's to not get too attached.
translation.es: Si aprendí algo aquí,es a no apegarme demasiado.

translation.en: Not everything has to end badly.
translation.es: No todo tiene que terminar mal.

translation.en: It's not gonna end, 'cause it never really started.
Okay, everyone, let's take a picture together.
On three, everyone say Merry Christmas, all right?
translation.es: A la cuenta de tres,todos dicen Feliz Navidad, ¿sí?

translation.en: I think I just found next year's Christmas card.
translation.es: Creo que encontré la tarjetade Navidad del año que viene.

translation.en: That beats the one we took in August. [laughs] It certainly does.
translation.es: - Le gana a la que tomamos en agosto.- Claro que sí.

translation.en: Well, it was really nice of your father to send you.
translation.es: Tu padre fue muy amable al enviarte.

translation.en: Got an apartment near the office.
The usual, [sighs] working, schmoozing clients. All that fun stuff.
translation.es: Lo de siempre, trabajary congraciarse con clientes. Cosas divertidas.

translation.en: You know, I get why you don't want to come back.
translation.es: Entiendo por qué no quieres regresar.

translation.en: Honey, I'm coming back. Mom, it's okay.
You and Dad never really liked the same things.
translation.es: A ti y a papá,nunca les agradaron las mismas cosas.

translation.en: The truth is, I'm surprised you stayed together as long as you did.
translation.es: Me sorprendeque hayan estado juntos tanto tiempo.

translation.en: it wasn't bad. It was just...
Remember when we brought home that stray dog, and Dad made us give him away?
translation.es: ¿Recuerdas cuando llevamosese perro callejero y papá nos obligó a entregarlo?

translation.en: Well, now you get to keep that stray dog.
translation.es: Ahora puedes quedartecon ese perro callejero.

translation.en: Yeah, you know, Comet, Cupid, Blixen.
translation.es: Sí, ya sabes, Cometa, Cupido, Relápago...

translation.en: I don't usually let people peek at my doodles.
translation.es: No suelo dejarque la gente vea mis garabatos.

translation.en: Many times, even after they're done.
translation.es: A veces, ni después de terminar.

translation.en: They teach you that in vet school?
Yeah, I've heard it called that.
translation.es: Sí, oí que se llamaba así.

translation.en: I don't usually say that about humans.
translation.es: No suelo decir eso de los humanos.

translation.en: And while we're in the Christmas spirit,
I should say that it hasn't been completely awful having you here either.
translation.es: debo decir que no ha sidototalmente horrible que estés aquí.

translation.en: you're really not as terrible as I thought you were at first.
translation.es: No eres tan terriblecomo pensé al principio.

translation.en: [laughs] That is most definitely -not mistletoe. -That is African mistletoe.
translation.es: - Definitivamente, no es muérdago.- Es muérdago africano.

translation.en: And even though we're in Africa,
we still celebrate the same worldwide mistletoe traditions.
translation.es: aún celebramos las mismas tradicionesde muérdago del mundo.

translation.en: You know, Freshman year is always a huge adjustment. I'm sure it's going to get better.
translation.es: El primer año es una gran adaptación.Estoy segura de que mejorará.

translation.en: Yeah, it's been a bit rough with the distance.
translation.es: Sí, ha sido un poco difícilcon la distancia.

translation.en: I don't mean to pry, but--
Please tell me those aren't what I think they are.
translation.es: Por favor, dime que eso no eslo que creo que es.

translation.en: How else am I supposed to measure an elephant?
translation.es: ¿Cómo se supone que mida a un elefante?

translation.en: Come here. I'm so happy you're here.
translation.es: Ven aquí.Estoy muy feliz de que estés aquí.

translation.en: It's the best Christmas present ever.
translation.es: Este es el mejor regalo de Navidad.

translation.en: Hey! Are you still Christmas shopping?
[Trish] I'm having Christmas lunch with Tabitha. Why aren't you with us?
translation.es: Voy a almorzar con Tabitha.¿Por qué no estás con nosotras?

translation.en: [sighs] I just could not face that empty apartment for the holidays.
translation.es: No podía enfrentar ese apartamento vacíopara las fiestas.

translation.en: He flew in yesterday to surprise me!
This year, it's gonna be Christmas in Africa.
translation.es: Este año, celebraremosla Navidad en África.

translation.en: And what is Christmas in Africa?
translation.es: ¿Y qué es la Navidad en África?

translation.en: Well, I can't speak for the whole continent, but here at the elephant orphanage,
translation.es: No sé si pasa en todo el continente,pero aquí en el orfanato,

translation.en: they celebrate all week, and there's no shopping involved.
translation.es: celebran toda la semanay no hacen compras.

translation.en: Well, you know what they say here?
they say, "When the time is right."
Okay. Now I'm really starting to worry.

translation.es: Vaya. El día de Navidad en África.

translation.en: Time goes so slowly out here.
translation.es: El tiempo pasa muy despacio aquí.

translation.en: I'm so proud of you, too!
translation.es: Yo también estoy muy orgullosa de ti.

translation.en: Well, I hope you still feel that way after I tell you what I'm gonna tell you.
translation.es: Bueno, espero que sigas sintiéndote asídespués de que te diga lo que te diré.

translation.en: It's about school. I'm really not into the business major.
translation.es: Es sobre la universidad.No me gusta la carrera de negocios.

translation.en: What do you want to study?
Now, see, that's not exactly it.
College is a waste of time for me. [stammers] I wanna make music.
translation.es: La universidad es una pérdida de tiempo.Quiero hacer música.
Eso es lo que me apasiona.

translation.en: And please don't say anything to Dad, I haven't told him yet.
translation.es: Por favor, no le digas a papá.Aún no se lo he dicho.

translation.en: you cannot just drop out of college.
Well, you left for Africa with no return date, and look at you! You're happy!
translation.es: Viniste a África sin fechade regreso y mírate, ¡estás feliz!

translation.en: Yeah, because I'm not waiting 20 years to do what I really wanna do.
translation.es: Sí, porque no espero 20 añospara hacer lo que quiero hacer.

translation.en: Well, my kid kinda got me out of the Christmas spirit.
translation.es: Mi hijo me quitó el espíritu navideño.

translation.en: Why don't you wait till then to miss him?
The problem is that he just announced that he's going to drop out of school,
translation.es: El problema es que acaba de anunciarque dejará  la universidad,

translation.en: play in a band, move in with his friends, and then write his own music in Starbucks.
translation.es: tocará en su banda, vivirá con sus amigosy escribirá su propia música en Starbucks.

translation.en: Isn't that how The Beatles started?
You don't understand! You don't even have kids!
[stammering] I'm just... I'm terrible company. I'm gonna go to bed.
translation.es: Soy una compañía terrible.Me voy a dormir.

translation.en: All right, I want you to think about what I said, okay?
translation.es: Bien, quiero que piensesen lo que dije, ¿sí?

translation.en: I love you, Mom, but I'm not changing my mind.
translation.es: Te amo, mamá,pero no cambiaré de opinión.

translation.en: -I love you so much. -I love you, too.
translation.es: - Te amo mucho.- Yo también te amo.

translation.en: I'll text you when I land in Newark.

translation.es: Yo no me preocuparía por Luke.

translation.en: He's a good kid. He's gonna be fine.
translation.es: Es un buen chico. Va a estar bien.

translation.en: I just feel guilty, you know?
I feel like I should've been there for him.
translation.es: Siento que debería haberme quedado con él.

translation.en: -I never meant to stay this long. -[exhales]

translation.es: Bueno, no puedes huir para siempre.

translation.en: I know. You're gonna miss me.
-That's not even what I was gonna say. -Oh, you're not gonna miss me?
translation.es: No iba a decir eso. ¿No me extrañarás?

translation.en: [chuckles] It's okay, 'cause I'm gonna miss you.
translation.es: Está bien, porque yo sí te extrañaré.

translation.en: I was going to surprise you with a Christmas present,
translation.es: Iba a sorprendertecon un regalo de Navidad,

translation.en: but now I'm not so sure.
translation.es: pero ahora no estoy tan segura.

translation.en: I don't think I've seen you paint anything but scenery.
translation.es: Creo que solo te vi pintar paisajes.

translation.en: Thought I'd give something else a try.
How's that turning out for you?
So I guess not very well.
People come to see the animals, and then they go home.
translation.es: Vienen a ver los animalesy luego se van a casa.

translation.en: Come to Cape Town with me. We'll see out the holidays there.
translation.es: Ven a Ciudad del Cabo conmigo.Pasaremos las fiestas allá.

translation.en: Whatever this is we've been doing...
translation.es: Sea lo que seaque hemos estado haciendo...

translation.en: Well, I regret to inform you
that the board has decided to terminate funding as of the new year.
translation.es: que el directorio decidió cancelarel financiamiento a partir del año nuevo.

translation.en: This isn't about us. This is about the elephants.
translation.es: No se trata de nosotros.Se trata de los elefantes.

translation.en: It's not about the bloody elephants for me.
translation.es: No se trata de los malditos elefantes.

translation.en: -Jonathan will drive you. -Oh. You're not gonna--
I have some tourists I have to fly out.
Well, you'd better be nice to those tourists, 'cause you just don't know how they're gonna turn out.
translation.es: Sé amable con los turistasporque no sabes cómo serán.

translation.en: If you come back here, I'll be here.
I guess I did see that one coming.
translation.es: Supongo que sí me lo esperaba.

translation.en: No. She's not returning my calls.
I'm thinking of flying down there,
talking to the board myself, see if I can get them to change their mind.
translation.es: y hablar con el directoriopara que cambie de opinión.

translation.en: You remember what happened last time?
translation.es: ¿Recuerdas lo que pasó la última vez?

translation.en: I will think before I speak
I really love animals, and I miss working with them so much.
translation.es: Me encantan los animalesy extraño mucho trabajar con ellos.

translation.en: Yes, I know they're not your typical clientele, but I'm also familiar with antelope, rhino
translation.es: Sí, sé que no son sus típicos clientes,pero también sé de antílopes, rinocerontes

translation.en: Thank you. Everyone calls me Dr. Kate.
translation.es: Gracias. Todos me llaman doctora Kate.

translation.en: I mean, you'd be getting a college degree, and you'd be doing something you love.
translation.es: Te darían un título universitarioy estarías haciendo algo que amas.

translation.en: I dunno. It's not really what I had in mind.
translation.es: No sé. No es como lo imaginaba.

translation.en: And it'd be really good for your musical career.
translation.es: Y sería muy bueno para tu carrera musical.

translation.en: I dunno. It's a lot to think about.
translation.es: No lo sé. Es mucho para pensar.

translation.en: Can I have a night to sleep on it? Of course, of course! Let's go get lunch.
translation.es: - ¿Puedo pensarlo esta noche?- ¡Claro! Vayamos a almorzar.

translation.en: He stays in college, but he studies something that he loves.
translation.es: Se queda en la universidad,pero estudia algo que ama.

translation.en: You're really okay with our son being...
translation.es: ¿Estás de acuerdo con que nuestro hijo...

translation.en: You know, it's his passion! I mean, when else is he going to get to try it?
translation.es: ¡Es su pasión!¿Cuándo podrá intentarlo si no?

translation.en: When he's 50 and he's in a job that he hates?
translation.es: ¿Cuando tenga 50 y un trabajo que deteste?

translation.en: he is never going to be you.
We just have to help him be himself.
translation.es: Solo debemos ayudarlo a ser él mismo.

translation.en: I know I said I wouldn't worry, but...
translation.es: Sé que dije que no me preocuparía, pero...

translation.en: Good. [stammers] And how are you? How is everyone?
Derek wouldn't want me to say anything. But...
translation.es: Derek no quiere que diga nada, pero...

translation.en: Derek got some emergency funding from another foundation,
translation.es: Derek recibió fondos de emergenciade otra fundación,

translation.en: but if we don't figure out something long-term and soon,
translation.es: pero si no lo resolvemosa largo plazo y pronto,

translation.en: I don't think we'll last much past June of next year.
translation.es: no creo que pasemosde junio del año que viene.

translation.en: Well, no, no, no, that can't happen!
Looks like we don't need the foundation.
translation.es: Parece que no necesitaremosa la fundación.

translation.en: Not for a very long time.
[Jonathan] At least not until next Christmas.
translation.es: Al menos hasta la próxima Navidad.

translation.en: -[Derek] How are you? -[man] Hi, how are you?
All right, what is this? Is it a thorn?
-[door opens] -[woman] King Charles in room needs a teeth cleaning,
translation.es: Rey Carlos, del dos,necesita una limpieza dental,

translation.en: Wait, that is the third time this week!
translation.es: Espera. ¡Es la tercera vez esta semana!

translation.en: And may I say that's a very nice sweater!
What are you in for? Just a nail clip.
translation.es: - ¿Por qué está aquí?- Para cortarle las uñas.

translation.en: And a refill on her antidepressants.
translation.es: Y una recarga de sus antidepresivos.

translation.en: [stammers] Just give me one second, okay?

translation.es: Lo siento mucho. Solo... un segundo.

translation.en: Is that how we're doing things now?

translation.es: Y a los elefantes les gusta.

translation.en: Maybe I should get you a bottle, cheer you up a bit.
translation.es: Quizá deba traerte una botellay animarte un poco.

translation.en: I have a pick-up. You want anything?
translation.es: Debo ir a buscar turistas. ¿Quieres algo?
- Café en granos, por favor.- Sí, señora.

translation.en: Are we up for some poker tonight?
[sighs] I wish I could. I have an early flight. Taking some tourist into the bush.
translation.es: Ojalá pudiera. Tengo un vuelo temprano.Llevaré a un turista a la selva.
La dama lo ordenó para ti.

translation.en: Two weeks ago, I sold my apartment.
translation.es: Hace dos semanas, vendí mi apartamento.

translation.en: Two days ago, I bought a one-way ticket.
translation.es: Hace dos días, compré un boleto de ida.

translation.en: And two minutes ago, I walked in here after a very long journey.
translation.es: Y hace dos minutos,entré aquí después de un largo viaje.

translation.en: Well, I hope you're ready for another one.
translation.es: Espero que estés lista para otro.
EN NUESTRA BODA Y NUESTRAS VIDAS.

translation.en: -[wistful music playing] -[Kate] Manu, I'm really gonna miss you.
I'm gonna think about you every day,
translation.es: Pensaré en ti todos los días

translation.en: and I want you to know not to be scared out there.
translation.es: y quiero que sepasque no debes tener miedo.

translation.en: You're gonna do great because you are smart
translation.es: Lo harás genial porque eres inteligente,

translation.en: and you are brave. Okay, baby?
Go live your life, all right?
And now I let him go just like that?
translation.es: ¿Y ahora lo dejo ir así sin más?
